Reviews.Title: Not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Bart Tanning
Reviews.Content: I contacted the seller because the #2 camera does not work. I asked if they could replace it. I'll update when I get an answer.If you are running wireless internet where you set this system up, the camera signals WILL cut off your G wireless signal..now I have to figure out how to get around that.Overall, the package you get is impressive. Complete kit is plug and play..if it all works. The cameras are fully articulaing, metal encased, but does NOT come with mounting hardware (screws). The signals are ok, but if you have them too close together, they will interfear with eachother.I gave it a 2 star rating mostly because of the non-working camera and that because the cameras have to be so far apart to work clearly so I cant get an optimum view of the areas I want to monitor. I'll keep it, but not happy.**Update same day. I got a form letter email from ther seller saying to return the "Item". Clearly they did not know that I wanted to replace just one camera. So, they didn't even read my request.I did, however, take apart the non working camera with a small phillips screwdriver. After pushing in a few connectors to re-set them, the camera just started working. I put it back together and now its fine.Again, this system will interfear with your G wireless router.Also one of the cameras, the #3, has to be within a few feet of the reciever to get a clear signal.I'm basically happy/not happy with it. Its doing the job I need, but I still give it a 2 star.

Reviews.Title: thought it would be more then it is
Reviews.Author: Bobby
Reviews.Content: so far so good don't have anything to say bad about it. but the sellers need to let people know you can't hook it up to your computer you will need to buy parts to get it to do that and it don't record either

Reviews.Title: bad receiver already
Reviews.Author: akdoggie
Reviews.Content: I bought mine last spring, hooked it up and had only 3 of 4 cameras working.  I can not use a wireless computer mouse as it interferes with the picture.  Yesterday the electronic receiver quit working.  Flashing lights only.  Not worth the money spent nor the aggravation that this equipment has caused.

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: in less than 6 months the wireless reciever quit working, dont seem to be able to get another one, no warranty, cant even buy a 4 camera wireless reciever

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Liquidfire
Reviews.Content: You don't have to spend a lot of money on security. This device really works great. I have one cam outside my house, and it still picks up picture, and sound. I think this is the best product for homes, small business, etc.

Reviews.Title: misleading
Reviews.Author: popeye
Reviews.Content: This is called  a wireless system and it  has more wires than my computer and all the wires are about 3 foot long so you can set up every thing in a small 3 foot circle and each camera has to have electricity within 3 foot because that is how long the adapter cords are. So could someone tell me how that is wireless.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 channels available at the same time.
Built-in 12 IR LED for 7m night vision range.
280TV line horizontal definition.
Built-in microphone in camera enables audio monitoring.
100m transmission distance without block.Professional waterproof design enables work outside.
ProductInfo.Name: Weather-proof Wireless Security Camera System DVR Infrared Surveillance (4) Quad View Quad Display 2.4ghz Night Vision Real Time Color
